author: Graig Graziosi, Graig Graziosi
title: Colorado's first Jewish governor tearfully responds to Republican leader comparing stay-at-home orders to Nazism
description: 'As a Jewish American who lost family in the Holocaust, I'm offended by any comparison to Nazism,' says Jared Polis
content:
Colorado's governor, Jared Polis, choked up while answering a question about people who have likened his stay-at-home orders - which are intended to slow the spread of the coronavirus - to Nazism.
A reporter for the Grand Junction Daily Sentinel asked Mr Pol… [+2972 chars]
